profile.title: Adwumayɛni Profayl
profile.mustLogin: Ɛsɛ sɛ wokɔ mu ansa na wubetumi ahwɛ nhyehyɛe no.
profile.autoTranslate: Kyerɛ ase nkrataa no ho nkɔmmɔbɔ no nkyerɛase
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Kyerɛ nkrataa a wɔkyerɛɛ ase no ne nea wɔkyerɛɛ mu no
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Kyerɛ nea wɔkyerɛɛ ase ne nea wɔkyerɛɛ mu abom
profile.allowExplicitContent: Ma nsɛm a ɛyɛ mpɔtam ho kwan
profile.disappearingMessages: Sɔ nkrataa a wɔyera no ho
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Sɛkɛnd biara akyi a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔpepa
profile.saveError: Mfomso: Entumi ankyerɛ nhyehyɛe no yie
profile.avatarError: Mfomso wɔ mfonini tow so mu
profile.noPrivateKey: Kɔn a ɛyɛ dea koro nni ha sɛ wobɛtumi asɔ mu.
profile.setBackupPassword: Hyɛ ehintasɛmfua ma sɛ wopɛ sɛ wokora wo nsie:
profile.backupDownloaded: Wɔatwe nsie a wɔabɔ ho ban no.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Kyerɛ ehintasɛmfua a wode bɔɔ nsie yi ho ban:
profile.importSuccess: Kɔn a ɛyɛ dea koro no aba afidie yi mu yie.
profile.importFailed: Entumi amfa kɔn no mmra (ehintasɛmfua ankyerɛ anaa fael no abɔne).
profile.keysRotated: Wɔbɔɔ kɔn foforo na wɔde kɔɔn a ɛda ho adi kɔɔ sorosoro.
profile.exportKey: Sɔ kɔn a ɛyɛ dea koro no mu
profile.importKey: Fa kɔn a wɔabɔ ho ban a wɔsiee no bra
profile.keyDisclaimer: Wo kɔn a ɛyɛ dea koro no nnya fi afidie yi so. Sɔ kɔpie a wɔabɔ ho ban mu na woatumi asan abɔ no wɔ afidie foforo so.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Wɔda ho kwa—fa Sun/Moon a ɛwɔ ase ha. Kɔ soro nkɔ upgrade na nya nsɛntitiriw foforo.
profile.sunTheme: Fa abɔdeɛ Dawuro ho tema no
profile.backupTitle: Nsie a wɔabɔ ho ban ne Afidie nsianhyɛ
profile.backupDesc: Bɔ nsie a wɔabɔ ho ban a wode ehintasɛmfua bɔ ho ban, na san fa no bra wɔ afidie foforo so ma ɛyɛ nsianhyɛ.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Bɔ nkrataa no ho dɛw daa
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Bɔ dɛw bere a app no m’ani nni so
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ka kyerɛ me sɛ obi yɛɛ kɔpie me nkrataa
profile.followHint: Wɔbɛkyerɛ wɔn nsɛm wɔ wo Following feed mu sɛ wɔde bɔ wɔn Follower (anaa Public) ho.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Ɛyɛɛ mfomso wɔ akyerɛwbea yi mu.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fa afrɛ ne nsɛm a wɔreba no kɔ wo nɔmba fɔn anaa email a wɔasɔ mu. Afrɛ/ntam nkrataa a wokɔ no betumi akyerɛ wo Chatforia nɔmba.
profile.quietHoursOptional: Afe a ɛyɛ dinn (wɔpɛ a wode bɛka ho)

chat.selectPrompt: Paw nkrataa anaa nkɔmmɔbea bi na fi ase nkɔmmɔ
